name: Gates Open Research API
provider: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation / F1000 Research
description: API for accessing open-access research articles funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Built on F1000 Research platform with immediate publication and open peer review.

access_info.rate_limits: 100 requests per 60 seconds, 100 results per request

endpoints.description: Search Gates Open Research articles using Solr queries

research_notes.data_quality: Good - built on established F1000 Research platform
research_notes.researcher_notes: Uses same API structure as F1000 Research with Solr-based search. No API key required for read access.
research_notes.api_summary: Gates Open Research API provides programmatic access to global health and development research publications funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Built on the F1000 Research platform, it offers Solr-based search capabilities and full-text access to research articles, making it valuable for researchers studying Gates-funded research outputs and global health initiatives.

name: BioRxiv API
description: API for accessing life sciences preprints from bioRxiv repository. Provides comprehensive access to preprint metadata with excellent documentation and community tools.

endpoints.description: Retrieves preprint details with pagination support

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive documentation with community R package
research_notes.researcher_notes: Well-documented API with active R package ecosystem. Self-imposed rate limiting recommended for responsible usage.
research_notes.api_summary: BioRxiv API provides comprehensive access to life sciences preprints, offering detailed metadata, version tracking, and publication status information. The API supports bulk access with pagination and is widely used by researchers and institutions for preprint discovery, bibliometric analysis, and building research applications focused on early-stage scientific communication.

name: MedRxiv API
description: API for accessing health sciences preprints from medRxiv repository. Shares infrastructure with bioRxiv but focuses on medical and health sciences research.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - shares infrastructure with bioRxiv API
research_notes.researcher_notes: Shares infrastructure with bioRxiv but focuses on health sciences. Same API structure and community tools available.
research_notes.api_summary: MedRxiv API provides access to health sciences preprints, enabling researchers to discover and analyze early-stage medical research. The API offers the same robust infrastructure as bioRxiv with comprehensive metadata, version tracking, and publication workflows, making it essential for medical researchers, public health analysts, and healthcare policy makers tracking emerging medical science.

name: ChemRxiv API
provider: Cambridge Open Engage / American Chemical Society
description: API for accessing chemistry preprints from ChemRxiv repository. Provides access to chemical sciences research with comprehensive metadata and search capabilities.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - comprehensive API documentation with OpenAPI schema
research_notes.researcher_notes: Requires API key registration. Built on Cambridge Open Engage platform with comprehensive search capabilities.
research_notes.api_summary: ChemRxiv API provides access to chemistry and chemical sciences preprints, offering comprehensive search and metadata retrieval capabilities. Built on the Cambridge Open Engage platform, it supports advanced filtering and search functionality, making it valuable for chemists, materials scientists, and researchers tracking developments in chemical sciences and related fields.

name: PsyArXiv API
description: Psychology preprints API based on Open Science Framework infrastructure. Provides access to psychological research preprints with comprehensive metadata.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive OSF API documentation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Part of OSF ecosystem with JSON:API standard compliance. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination.
research_notes.api_summary: PsyArXiv API provides comprehensive access to psychology preprints through the Open Science Framework infrastructure. It offers robust search, filtering, and metadata access capabilities, making it essential for psychological researchers, meta-analysts, and institutions tracking developments in behavioral sciences and psychology research.

name: SocArXiv API
description: Social sciences preprints API built on Open Science Framework. Provides access to social science research across multiple disciplines.

endpoints.response_format: JSON:API format with social science metadata

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - shares OSF infrastructure and documentation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Built on OSF platform with JSON:API compliance. Strong community adoption in social sciences.
research_notes.api_summary: SocArXiv API provides access to social sciences preprints through the Open Science Framework, enabling researchers to discover and analyze early-stage social science research. The API supports comprehensive filtering and search capabilities, making it valuable for social scientists, policy researchers, and institutions tracking developments across social science disciplines.

name: EarthArXiv API
description: Earth sciences preprints API providing access to geoscience research. Community-driven repository for earth and environmental sciences.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - community-driven with standard REST practices
research_notes.researcher_notes: Community-driven repository with focus on earth and environmental sciences. Standard REST API implementation.
research_notes.api_summary: EarthArXiv API provides access to earth and environmental sciences preprints, offering researchers a platform to discover early-stage geoscience research. The API supports search and metadata retrieval capabilities, making it valuable for earth scientists, climate researchers, and environmental policy makers tracking developments in earth system sciences.

name: LawArXiv API
description: Legal scholarship preprints API (limited public documentation available). Focuses on legal research and jurisprudence.

research_notes.data_quality: Unknown - no public API documentation found
research_notes.researcher_notes: Limited public information available about API access. Repository exists but API documentation not publicly accessible.
research_notes.api_summary: LawArXiv appears to be a legal scholarship repository, but no public API documentation was found during research. Legal researchers seeking programmatic access to legal scholarship should contact the repository directly or consider alternative legal databases with documented APIs.

name: EngrXiv API
description: Engineering preprints API based on Open Science Framework infrastructure. Provides access to engineering research across multiple disciplines.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - shares OSF infrastructure
research_notes.researcher_notes: Built on OSF platform with standard JSON:API compliance. Growing adoption in engineering communities.
research_notes.api_summary: EngrXiv API provides access to engineering preprints through the Open Science Framework, enabling researchers to discover and analyze early-stage engineering research. The API offers robust search and filtering capabilities, making it valuable for engineers, technology researchers, and institutions tracking developments in applied sciences and engineering disciplines.

name: AfricArXiv API
description: African research repository and knowledge commons API. Provides access to research from African institutions and researchers.

endpoints.response_format: JSON:API format with African research metadata

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - OSF infrastructure with regional focus
research_notes.researcher_notes: Built on OSF platform with focus on African research and knowledge commons. Supports multilingual content.
research_notes.api_summary: AfricArXiv API provides access to African research and knowledge commons through the Open Science Framework, enabling discovery of research from African institutions and researchers. The API supports comprehensive filtering and search capabilities, making it valuable for African studies researchers, development organizations, and institutions interested in African research contributions.

name: ArabiXiv API
description: Arabic language research preprints repository (limited public API documentation available). Focuses on Arabic-language scientific research.

research_notes.data_quality: Unknown - limited public documentation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Limited public information available. Repository exists but API documentation not publicly accessible.
research_notes.api_summary: ArabiXiv appears to be a repository for Arabic-language scientific research, but no public API documentation was found during research. Researchers interested in Arabic scientific literature should contact the repository directly for programmatic access information.

name: INA'XiV API
description: Indonesian research preprints API focusing on scientific research from Indonesian institutions and researchers.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - standard REST implementation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Regional repository with focus on Indonesian research. Standard REST API with search capabilities.
research_notes.api_summary: INA'XiV API provides access to Indonesian research preprints, enabling discovery of scientific research from Indonesian institutions and researchers. The API supports search and metadata retrieval capabilities, making it valuable for Southeast Asian studies researchers and institutions interested in Indonesian research contributions.

name: SciELO Preprints API
description: SciELO preprints API based on Open Preprint Systems (OPS) platform. Provides access to Latin American preprints with multilingual support.

endpoints.response_format: JSON with Latin American preprint metadata

research_notes.data_quality: Good - built on established OPS platform
research_notes.researcher_notes: Part of established SciELO network with strong regional focus. Supports multilingual content and filtering.
research_notes.api_summary: SciELO Preprints API provides access to Latin American preprints through the established SciELO network infrastructure. The API offers multilingual support and regional filtering capabilities, making it valuable for Latin American studies researchers, regional development organizations, and institutions interested in Hispanic and Portuguese research contributions.

name: Research Square API
description: Multidisciplinary preprint platform API with Springer Nature integration. Provides access to preprints across all research disciplines.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - requires formal API access request
research_notes.researcher_notes: Requires formal API access request. Partnership with Springer Nature provides high-quality metadata and DOI integration.
research_notes.api_summary: Research Square API provides access to multidisciplinary preprints with Springer Nature integration, offering comprehensive metadata and DOI tracking. The platform requires formal API access approval but provides high-quality data and integration with traditional publishing workflows, making it valuable for institutions and researchers tracking the full research lifecycle.

name: Authorea API
description: Collaborative research writing platform API with document management and version control. Enables programmatic access to collaborative research documents.

endpoints.response_format: JSON with document metadata and collaboration info

research_notes.data_quality: Good - comprehensive collaboration features
research_notes.researcher_notes: Focused on collaborative writing rather than published research. Part of Wiley ecosystem with academic integration.
research_notes.api_summary: Authorea API provides access to collaborative research writing platform data, enabling programmatic interaction with document management, version control, and collaboration features. The API supports tracking of manuscript development and author contributions, making it valuable for research institutions and collaborative projects monitoring document workflows and team productivity.

name: PubPeer API
description: Post-publication peer review platform (no official public API documented). Enables anonymous post-publication review and discussion of published research.

research_notes.data_quality: Platform exists but no public API found
research_notes.researcher_notes: Platform exists for post-publication peer review but no public API documentation found. Contact platform directly for programmatic access.
research_notes.api_summary: PubPeer is a post-publication peer review platform that enables anonymous discussion and review of published research. While the platform provides valuable post-publication review capabilities, no public API documentation was found during research. Researchers interested in post-publication review data should contact PubPeer directly for potential programmatic access options.

name: F1000Research API
description: Open access research platform API with immediate publication and open peer review. Provides comprehensive access to research articles and peer review data.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive documentation with immediate publication model
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in open peer review with immediate publication. API provides access to peer review data and transparent review process.
research_notes.api_summary: F1000Research API provides comprehensive access to open access research with transparent peer review, offering immediate publication and continuous peer review capabilities. The API enables access to both research content and peer review data, making it valuable for researchers studying scientific communication, peer review processes, and institutions implementing open science practices.

name: PeerJ API
description: Open access journal API for life and environmental sciences. Provides access to peer-reviewed research with innovative publishing model.

endpoints.response_format: JSON with life sciences article metadata

research_notes.data_quality: Good - standard REST implementation for life sciences
research_notes.researcher_notes: Innovative publishing model with lifetime memberships. Strong focus on life and environmental sciences.
research_notes.api_summary: PeerJ API provides access to open access research in life and environmental sciences, offering innovative publishing model data and comprehensive metadata. The API supports search and filtering capabilities, making it valuable for life sciences researchers, environmental scientists, and institutions tracking developments in biological and environmental research.

name: PLOS API
description: Public Library of Science API for accessing open access research articles. Comprehensive Solr-based search with excellent documentation and developer community.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive Solr-based search with full-text capabilities
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in open access publishing with comprehensive API documentation. Strong developer community and tools.
research_notes.api_summary: PLOS API provides comprehensive access to one of the largest collections of open access research in life sciences and medicine. Using Solr-based search technology, it offers powerful full-text search capabilities and detailed metadata access, making it essential for biomedical researchers, meta-analysis studies, and institutions implementing evidence-based practices.

name: BMC API
description: BioMed Central API for accessing biomedical and life sciences research. Part of Springer Nature portfolio with comprehensive open access content.

research_notes.data_quality: High - part of established Springer Nature infrastructure
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in biomedical open access publishing. Strong integration with Springer Nature ecosystem and comprehensive coverage.
research_notes.api_summary: BMC API provides access to one of the largest collections of biomedical and life sciences open access research through the BioMed Central platform. As part of Springer Nature, it offers high-quality metadata and comprehensive coverage of biomedical disciplines, making it essential for medical researchers, healthcare professionals, and institutions conducting systematic reviews and meta-analyses.

name: Hindawi API
description: Hindawi academic publisher API for accessing multidisciplinary research. Provides comprehensive access to open access research across multiple disciplines.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - established publisher with comprehensive coverage
research_notes.researcher_notes: Multidisciplinary publisher with strong presence in engineering and mathematics. Comprehensive API with good rate limits.
research_notes.api_summary: Hindawi API provides access to multidisciplinary open access research with strong coverage in engineering, mathematics, and applied sciences. The API offers comprehensive metadata and citation tracking capabilities, making it valuable for researchers across multiple disciplines and institutions conducting cross-disciplinary research and systematic reviews.

name: MDPI API
description: MDPI API for accessing rapid publication open access research. Comprehensive coverage across multiple disciplines with high publication standards.

content_summary.update_frequency: Rapid publication model with continuous updates

research_notes.data_quality: High - rapid publication with comprehensive peer review
research_notes.researcher_notes: Known for rapid publication times while maintaining quality standards. Comprehensive multidisciplinary coverage with strong indexing.
research_notes.api_summary: MDPI API provides access to rapidly published open access research across multiple disciplines, offering comprehensive metadata and high-quality content. The API enables access to one of the largest multidisciplinary open access publishers, making it valuable for researchers seeking current developments across various fields and institutions tracking emerging research trends.

name: Frontiers API
description: Frontiers Media API for accessing open science research across disciplines. Innovative peer review with transparent review process and community-driven research.

research_notes.data_quality: High - innovative peer review with transparency
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in transparent peer review and community-driven research. Strong focus on innovation and open science practices.
research_notes.api_summary: Frontiers API provides access to open science research with innovative transparent peer review processes, offering comprehensive metadata and community engagement data. The API enables access to cutting-edge research with transparent review information, making it valuable for researchers studying scientific innovation and institutions implementing open science and transparent peer review practices.

name: eLife API
description: eLife Sciences API for accessing life sciences research with innovative peer review. Selective journal with comprehensive API and excellent documentation hosted on GitHub.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive GitHub-hosted documentation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Highly selective journal with innovative peer review. Strong GitHub presence with comprehensive API documentation and community tools.
research_notes.api_summary: eLife API provides access to high-quality life sciences research with innovative peer review and comprehensive metadata. As a selective journal focusing on research excellence, the API offers detailed article information and peer review data, making it valuable for life sciences researchers and institutions studying high-impact biological research and innovative peer review processes.

name: SciELO API
description: Scientific Electronic Library Online API for accessing Latin American research. Comprehensive regional network with multilingual support and bibliometric capabilities.

endpoints.response_format: JSON with Latin American research metadata
JSON with journal metadata and metrics

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive regional coverage with bibliometric data
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in regional open access with strong bibliometric capabilities. Comprehensive coverage of Latin American research with multilingual support.
research_notes.api_summary: SciELO API provides comprehensive access to Latin American and Ibero-American research through an established regional network, offering multilingual support and bibliometric analysis capabilities. The API enables access to region-specific research outputs and citation metrics, making it essential for Latin American studies, regional development research, and institutions studying global South research contributions.
